channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
well, they might be the same, but i dunno..
1. how do i make level requirements to wear items?
2. how do i make Combat requirements to wear items? [br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 09:44:13 AM[/size][hr]ugh its been hours, nobody knows? im sure somebody does :(

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:3, topic:131492”]Wtf ownage plz, you were 75 rep last night, and now you’re 87…Btw how’d my little thread go?

public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Mime")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Lava")) { return 99; } return 1; }

I added hp all by myself :D[/quote]

I help people it’s what I do … notice my 943 posts in the dev/help section lol …

Basically what you do is use getCL… and under it add

if (ItemName.startsWith("Whatever")) { return #; }

or

if(ItemID == ####) { return #; }

second one is a bit more specific …

then if you look at the wear method you can figure out how it works more.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Confused with what SmokeSome, you just find GetCLAttack, Str, Def, or maybe even range. Then you add the item under the last item there. Like this.

public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Mime")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Lava")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Mith")) { return 25; } return 1; }

Read full topic
